text: Thinle Lhondup (), also known as Thinley or Thinlen, (1943/1944 - April 24, 2016) was a popular Nepalese actor. He was best known for his role in the Academy Award-nominated movie Himalaya (1999).Movies with Thinle lhondup Movies records with ThinleCaravan (himalaya) - the oscar nominated nepali movie aankha dot com Thinle appears in some music videos in Nepal as well. Thinle died on April 24, 2016 in Kathmandu, Nepal from stomach cancer, aged 72. ==References== Category:1940s births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Nepalese movie actors
title: Thinle Lhondup
